opportunities.title: Enhanced Understanding of Matrix Roles
opportunities.description: Greg highlighted a lack of understanding of the matrix COO role, which affected candidate quality. Future engagements would benefit from a deeper understanding of complex roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think they struggled to understand what the matrix nature of the organization of the business was, what the role was.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Invest in training consultants to better understand and clarify complex or matrix-style roles with clients.

opportunities.title: Proactive Engagement and Market Insights
opportunities.description: Greg appreciated proactive updates and market knowledge from competitors. Expanding the relationship could involve offering similar value-add services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Hunter Healthcare offers strong market knowledge, proactive updates, and value-add connections.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a strategy to provide regular market insights and proactive engagement to clients, similar to competitors.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust and Demonstrate Value
opportunities.description: Greg expressed dissatisfaction with the service and stated he would not use Korn Ferry again. Immediate action is needed to rebuild trust and demonstrate value.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Would you use them again? – No and to be honest, we have a senior role now, but I've gone somewhere else.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Reach out to Greg with a tailored plan addressing his concerns and offering a trial engagement with improved service terms.

opportunities.title: Align Candidate Quality Expectations
opportunities.description: There was a mismatch in candidate quality expectations, leading to dissatisfaction. Improving this alignment is crucial for future success.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some of the people on the shortlist had minimal experience... after five minutes, you knew they just were nowhere near what you wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a process to ensure early and clear alignment on candidate quality expectations with clients.

opportunities.title: Improve Compensation and Offer Guidance
opportunities.description: Greg noted weak guidance on compensation and the offer process. Improving clarity and ownership in these areas would enhance service quality.
opportunities.supportingQuote: When it came to saying, right, perhaps our candidate, let's negotiate. What does she expect? And the answer was, I don't know.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide consultants with tools and training to offer clearer guidance on compensation and the offer process.

opportunities.title: Enhance Flexibility in Client Engagement
opportunities.description: The engagement dynamic felt one-sided, with scheduling often based on consultant availability. Increasing flexibility could improve client satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Engagement often depended on consultant availability rather than client need.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Adopt a more client-centric approach to scheduling and communication to better meet client needs.

opportunities.title: Need for Candidates with Asian Market Experience
opportunities.description: Harry expressed a desire for candidates with more experience in the Asian market, acknowledging the challenge due to the market's youth.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have liked to see someone with a lot more Asian experience... but I also have to be fair to Korn Ferry — not necessarily a lot of those people exist, right?
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore expanding their candidate pool to include more individuals with Asian market experience to meet future client needs.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Recruitment Services for Small Companies
opportunities.description: Harry values Korn Ferry's recruitment services for senior-level positions and sees them as a priority area for spending.
opportunities.supportingQuote: something like, you know, recruitment in that sort of level, absolutely, you know, that's where I think the dollars are very well spent.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should continue to focus on delivering high-quality recruitment services tailored to the needs of small companies like Maracorp.

opportunities.title: Address Cost Concerns for Broader Consultancy
opportunities.description: Harry mentioned that consultancy work is seen as expensive for his small company, which affects his willingness to engage in services beyond recruitment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm a small company...and they are, of course, costly, right?...would they come to me top of the list for an organizational development? No, I don't think I would put them on top of the list.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should consider offering tailored consultancy packages or pricing models that are more accessible to small companies to encourage broader engagement.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Expertise in Emerging Markets
opportunities.description: There is a need to improve the expertise of candidates in emerging markets like Asia, as highlighted by Harry's feedback.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have liked to see someone with a lot more Asian experience...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should invest in building a stronger network of candidates with expertise in emerging markets to better meet client demands.

opportunities.title: Potential Role of AI in Logistics
opportunities.description: Tony noted that AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, suggesting a potential area for Korn Ferry to explore.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Tony noted that while AI could play a role in logistics or market reach in the future, today the value of Korn Ferry lies in its people-first approach.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore AI-driven solutions for logistics and market reach to enhance future service offerings.

opportunities.title: Enhance Compensation Benchmarking Support
opportunities.description: While compensation benchmarking is handled internally, Korn Ferry could provide additional data points to inform Carilion's analysis.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If Korn Ferry had that information, it could help inform us as a data point, but it would not be the benchmark we would use in our final analysis.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer to provide comprehensive compensation data to support Carilion's internal benchmarking processes.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Trust with Personal History
opportunities.description: Tony's personal history as a candidate in a Korn Ferry-led search has strengthened trust, which can be leveraged to deepen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Personal history as a candidate strengthened trust and continuity – Tony had previously been a finalist in a Korn Ferry-led search, including for their current role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to build on the personal history and trust established with Tony to further solidify the partnership.

opportunities.title: Position Assessment Tools as Complementary
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's assessment tools are valued but should be positioned as complementary to Carilion's internal processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think Korn Ferry's tool is good, it's helpful, and again it's just one additional data point for us as we think through how we assess our candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Emphasize the complementary nature of Korn Ferry's assessment tools in communications with Carilion Clinic.

opportunities.title: Proactive Assessment Notifications
opportunities.description: Implement a system to proactively notify clients when assessment results are sent to avoid delays and reliance on client follow-up.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There hadn't been a communication from the team beyond sending it to a dedicated mailbox...that sort of proactive nudge that says, Hey...This is where things are standing. That was missing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Integrate proactive notification alerts into the assessment result delivery process.

opportunities.title: Leverage Consultant Expertise for Role Shaping
opportunities.description: Highlight Korn Ferry's ability to reshape roles and expand talent pools through consultant expertise, as demonstrated in the Controller search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: As Anne's a CPA... she was really additive in terms of saying, you're calling this X, this is how it looks in the market... and that opened up the pool of talent.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Use this case as a proof point in marketing materials to demonstrate the value of consultant expertise in role shaping.

opportunities.title: Set Clear Communication Expectations
opportunities.description: Establish clear communication preferences and expectations upfront to ensure alignment and avoid frustration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If we had search to do over again, I would rehire them, as long as we did some early setting of communication preferences, timeliness of responses.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Agree on SLAs, preferred communication channels, and response times at the start of each engagement.

opportunities.title: Maintain Candidate Pipeline Until Hire Confirmation
opportunities.description: Ensure a continuous flow of candidates until a hire is fully confirmed to avoid over-reliance on a single finalist.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I was not quite comfortable that we had a ready backup pool we'd be able to immediately bring in and continue the process.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a standard practice of sustaining candidate pipelines until an offer is fully secured.

opportunities.title: Need for Association-Specific Expertise
opportunities.description: The client expressed a need for consultants who understand the unique operational and governance model of associations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The consultant struggled to fully grasp the unique operational and governance model of associations.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Deploy consultants with specific experience in member-driven governance models for future association-related searches.

opportunities.title: Leverage Sector Credibility for Future Engagements
opportunities.description: Despite current challenges, Korn Ferry's prior work with national associations provides a foundation to rebuild trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Prior work with the national association gave Korn Ferry initial trust and an advantage in pitching.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Highlight past successes in association-sector searches in future pitches to reinforce credibility.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust Through Governance Alignment
opportunities.description: The client expressed a lack of confidence due to bypassing agreed governance structures, indicating a need to rebuild trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The challenges affected confidence in re-engagement. While Shannon acknowledged Korn Ferry's strong reputation, she noted they 'would not... be on top of the list to call' right now for future searches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure strict adherence to agreed decision-making processes and governance structures in future engagements.

opportunities.title: Enhance Responsiveness to Client Feedback
opportunities.description: The client reported delays in actioning feedback, particularly around narrowing candidate numbers.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It took me calling him twice to get that to stop.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a system to promptly acknowledge and act on client feedback to improve responsiveness.

opportunities.title: Align Candidate Recommendations with Client Criteria
opportunities.description: There were issues with candidate recommendations not aligning with the client's criteria, causing friction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some recommendations did not reflect the client's clear criteria or feedback, creating unnecessary friction.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure candidate recommendations strictly adhere to the client's specified criteria and feedback.

opportunities.title: Clarify Assessment Approach Early
opportunities.description: Michael emphasized the need for a proactive discussion about assessment processes to avoid overlap with Cargill's own intensive process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: My only recommendation is to make sure you have a very clear conversation with your client about your assessment, whether they have one, and whether it makes sense to do both. Yeah, upfront.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate early discussions with clients to align on assessment processes and avoid duplication.

opportunities.title: Deepen Thought Partnership
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's expert guidance was highly valued, suggesting an opportunity to expand their role as thought partners in additional areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were [a] really good thought partner on process, like who the candidate should interview with.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional areas where Korn Ferry can provide strategic guidance to further strengthen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Sustain Pipeline Confidence
opportunities.description: There was concern about having options for stakeholders during the search, which was resolved by introducing a strong candidate late in the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was some stress at one point that, like, man, are we putting all our eggs in one basket... at the 11th hour, Korn Ferry pulled a rabbit out of their hat with the candidate that ultimately got this job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure continuous engagement with clients by maintaining a robust candidate pipeline throughout the search process.

opportunities.title: Broaden Candidate Pipelines
opportunities.description: Michael noted that at one stage, the search felt too dependent on a single finalist, indicating a need for broader candidate pipelines.
opportunities.supportingQuote: At one stage the search felt too dependent on a single finalist, creating concern about having options for stakeholders.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Enhance sourcing strategies to ensure a broad and diverse candidate pool is maintained throughout the search.

opportunities.title: Need for Quicker Interim Updates
opportunities.description: Dr. Nina expressed a desire for quicker interim updates to reassure stakeholders and provide feedback earlier in the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It would have been better to just get...the first profile to work with...and tell them [yes] that's going in the right direction.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a system for providing early draft profiles to clients for feedback before finalizing the shortlist.

opportunities.title: Enhance Flexibility in Processes
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's structured methodology was perceived as less pragmatic compared to boutique firms, suggesting a need for more flexibility.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes I would have liked them to be a bit more...flexible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce more adaptable processes that allow for client-specific adjustments while maintaining quality standards.

opportunities.title: Address Initial Perception of Disengagement
opportunities.description: The CFO initially felt Korn Ferry was disengaged, indicating a need to strengthen early engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: In the very beginning [the CFO] really had the impression they [Korn Ferry] didn't want to do the job.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage key stakeholders early with clear communication to prevent perceptions of disinterest.

opportunities.title: Improve Response Times
opportunities.description: Emails sometimes went unanswered for extended periods, highlighting a need for faster response times.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Sometimes it took 30 hours or so but you have an email to three [people] so you would have thought at least one of them could just tell me, look, we are going to answer maybe tomorrow.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear response time expectations and ensure team members are accountable for timely communication.

opportunities.title: Adopt Modern Data Handling Practices
opportunities.description: Profiles were sent by email rather than via the customer's preferred secure method, indicating a need for updated data handling practices.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I didn't want to have any profiles in my inbox...[I'd rather you] share your drive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Adopt secure and client-preferred methods for sharing profiles, such as using shared drives.

opportunities.title: Advisory on AI and Workforce Evolution
opportunities.description: Stephen highlighted the importance of understanding AI's impact on the workforce, skill development, and compensation structures, suggesting a need for advisory conversations on these topics.
opportunities.supportingQuote: AI awareness is something always on my mind… it’s confusing, but it’s changing how younger generations develop within the workforce.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate discussions with Stephen on AI's impact on workforce and compensation strategies to explore potential advisory services.

opportunities.title: Broader Engagement as DLH Grows
opportunities.description: Stephen expressed willingness to consider using Korn Ferry more broadly as DLH Holdings grows, indicating potential for expanded services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I have introduced them to people I know who are in the private sector. I've done that two or three times. I've made introductions...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to expand service offerings to DLH Holdings as they grow, ensuring alignment with their evolving needs.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Internal Quality Control
opportunities.description: Occasional errors in presentation materials have slightly undermined confidence, indicating a need for improved quality assurance.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I always trust their work. But...there are times where I have found mistakes...which I'm kind of surprised about.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement additional quality control measures to ensure accuracy in deliverables and maintain client confidence.

opportunities.title: Enhance Quality Assurance in Deliverables
opportunities.description: Stephen noted occasional calculation/formula errors in presentations, suggesting a need for enhanced quality assurance processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Occasional calculation/formula errors in presentations slightly undermined confidence.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce rigorous quality assurance checks to prevent errors in client deliverables.

opportunities.title: Post-Placement Follow-Up for Candidate Feedback
opportunities.description: Vanessa expressed a desire for Korn Ferry to conduct follow-up calls with placed candidates to gather feedback and reinforce the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I really hope that they will do a follow up with [our placement]...when she's [been] here for a few weeks and then maybe within three or six months....Give her a call and really ask like how is it going and then give me the feedback because that's really valuable for me.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a structured post-placement follow-up process to gather feedback from both clients and candidates.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Candidate Reports
opportunities.description: The initial candidate report was delivered too close to the interview, limiting preparation time for Vanessa.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They sent the first candidate report...48 hours before the interview...I told them that this was too short.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Standardize earlier delivery timelines for candidate reports to ensure clients have sufficient preparation time.

opportunities.title: Consistency in Candidate Report Content
opportunities.description: An early candidate report lacked specific details required for the interview, which was quickly corrected.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There was also some information missing... but they were very reactive and adapted it for the next reports.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure all candidate reports consistently include comprehensive details to meet client expectations.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Premium Positioning for Senior Roles
opportunities.description: Vanessa views Korn Ferry as a premium partner for senior-level searches, justifying the higher fees for such roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: For ExCo positions, yes. For other positions, no, because actually their fees are higher than all the other headhunters in Belgium.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to emphasize Korn Ferry's value proposition and premium service for executive and senior management searches.

opportunities.title: Leverage Broader Expertise and Data
opportunities.description: Lisa has utilized Korn Ferry's data for various needs and expressed interest in accessing more resources. This indicates a potential need for expanded data services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm like I actually need something in this area, have you got something that would help, while it's not everyday...there's been a sharing of all the resources that are available to us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer a consultation to explore additional data and expertise that could support PartnerRe's strategic goals.

opportunities.title: Enhance Cross-Regional Coordination
opportunities.description: Lisa noted challenges in communication and coordination across regions, suggesting an opportunity to improve these processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: [There's] an opportunity to work on communication when there are multiple teams around the table.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a standardized communication protocol for cross-regional engagements to ensure seamless coordination.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Listening Practices
opportunities.description: Lisa highlighted the need for deeper listening, particularly in US-led searches, indicating a need to reinforce listening-first behaviors.
opportunities.supportingQuote: There's probably a little bit more listening needed on the US side than the European side... sometimes to prove you want to do a great job, you can over-talk.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Conduct training sessions focused on reflective listening and client-led dialogue for consultants involved in US-based searches.

opportunities.title: Streamline Scheduling Processes
opportunities.description: Issues with last-minute meeting arrangements were noted, suggesting a need to improve scheduling processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I know there's been some [difficulty] trying to get meetings in the diary with CFF, or interviews in the diary with the CFF last minute, which is never going to work for her.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear scheduling protocols and advance notice requirements to prevent last-minute conflicts.

opportunities.title: Ensure Consistency Across Teams
opportunities.description: The quality of delivery has varied when different consultants lead searches, affecting client satisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I wasn't as impressed...we had a talent search...the person that was on it was fine but then he ended up leaving so wasn't as engaged...Jerry took over and we were able to move the process along pretty quickly...it depends on the team that you're working with.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement standardized processes and training across all teams to ensure consistent delivery quality.

opportunities.title: Share Market Insights and Benchmarking
opportunities.description: Cana expressed interest in receiving periodic benchmarking or compensation insights to aid decision-making.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If we could get more comp benchmarking surveys. I know that when we used to work... with Heidrick & Struggles, they would send us an annual comp report which was helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer periodic market insights and compensation benchmarking reports to Macquarie.

opportunities.title: Support in Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Initiatives
opportunities.description: Macquarie is focusing on increasing diverse representation in senior hiring, presenting an opportunity for Korn Ferry to assist.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Key HR priorities include: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: increasing diverse representation in senior hiring.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose tailored strategies and candidate sourcing to enhance diversity in senior hiring processes.

opportunities.title: Digital and AI Integration Support
opportunities.description: Macquarie is looking to expand technological capability and data-led decision-making, indicating a need for expertise in digital and AI integration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Digital and AI integration: expanding technological capability and data-led decision-making across the business.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer consulting services or partnerships focused on digital transformation and AI integration.

opportunities.title: Maintain Proactive Post-Placement Contact
opportunities.description: Continuing informal follow-ups with placed candidates and hiring managers can sustain relationship continuity.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think you know they [Korn Ferry] do stay in touch [with placed candidates] ...they can also give the hires advice on how to best on board into Macquarie and be successful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Enhance post-placement engagement strategies to maintain strong relationships with placed candidates and hiring managers.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Assessment Services
opportunities.description: Mike expressed a need for more insightful and actionable assessment outputs that align with client expectations.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The assessment outputs were seen as less insightful and not fully aligned with expectations.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review and enhance the assessment design and outputs to ensure they provide the depth and clarity clients require.

opportunities.title: Broaden Client Engagement Beyond Lead Consultant
opportunities.description: Mike's experience was largely shaped by Dan's personal approach, indicating potential to expand client engagement to include more team members.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I didn't feel like I was working exactly with Korn Ferry... Dan comes with quite creative approaches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a strategy to involve more team members in client engagements to showcase the full breadth of Korn Ferry's capabilities.

opportunities.title: Improve Early-Stage Search Process
opportunities.description: The early-stage mapping and resourcing took longer than planned, suggesting a need to re-engage and streamline these processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Early-stage mapping took longer than planned... it felt like Dan had to pull the weight.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Re-evaluate and optimize the early-stage search process to ensure timely and efficient delivery.

opportunities.title: Standardize Delivery and Communication
opportunities.description: There is a need to ensure consistent quality and communication across different teams and engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The experience reflected Dan's partnership strength rather than a consistent firm-wide standard.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement standardized communication and delivery practices across all teams to ensure consistency.

opportunities.title: Enhance Usability of KF4D Platform
opportunities.description: The KF4D platform is comprehensive but difficult to navigate, limiting access to valuable insights.
opportunities.supportingQuote: KF4D usability... it's incredibly hard to get out.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Simplify the KF4D platform to improve ease of access and usability for clients.

opportunities.title: Potential for Leadership Development Services
opportunities.description: Briony had a positive experience with Korn Ferry's leadership development services in a previous role, indicating a potential future need if budget allows.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Leadership development is delivered in-house at IVC due to budget priorities, though Briony previously had an excellent experience with Korn Ferry’s development offering in a previous role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to offer leadership development services to IVC when budget constraints are alleviated.

opportunities.title: Expand Executive Search Beyond Finance
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry is primarily engaged for finance searches, but there is potential to expand services to other executive roles within IVC.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I use them extensively for finance...but there are other parts of the organization [that] use Korn Ferry for CEO, general management type roles.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Propose expanding Korn Ferry's executive search services to other departments within IVC.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Relationship with Non-Finance Departments
opportunities.description: While Korn Ferry is a go-to partner for finance, there is an opportunity to strengthen relationships with other departments that use Korn Ferry for different roles.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They're not the only search firm that we use for our exec roles, but they certainly [are] one of the go-to search firms that are used.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with other departments at IVC to understand their needs and reinforce Korn Ferry's value proposition.

opportunities.title: Tailored Communication Strategies
opportunities.description: Briony noted that some stakeholders prefer traditional communication methods over online portals, suggesting a need for tailored communication strategies.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Some of my leaders...very happily log into a portal...but there are some stakeholders who are used to getting a report sent through on email, feedback on a phone call.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure communication methods are tailored to the preferences of individual stakeholders to maintain engagement and satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Integration of Quantitative Metrics in Candidate Profiles
opportunities.description: The client expressed a need for more detailed candidate profiles, including quantitative metrics such as market cap and TSR, to better assess candidates' past performance.
opportunities.supportingQuote: [what] would be meaningful...and we did add it to our profiles [as] I don't think we had market cap in there originally [but] It's important to see, obviously different industries have different scales they're looking at...I liked seeing that with the candidates...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Integrate relevant quantitative performance metrics into candidate profiles for future searches.

opportunities.title: Deepen Engagement Through CEO Succession Work
opportunities.description: The successful board recruitment has led to further engagement with Korn Ferry for CEO succession, indicating an opportunity to deepen the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Success with board recruitment led to further work on CEO succession...it just shows from the initial RFP process where she outlined the strategic approach and long term partnership value is playing out for us here.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Leverage the success in board recruitment to further strengthen the partnership through CEO succession and other strategic roles.

opportunities.title: Formalize Communication Structure
opportunities.description: There is a need to establish a formal communication process to improve efficiency and clarity among multiple stakeholders.
opportunities.supportingQuote: we didn't really talk about a formal communication process...they didn't necessarily have a point person...I did think when I get a chance to take a breath with all these searches going on, I would recap with Jane [on] how can we be more effective with you on this...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a formal communication structure with designated points of contact and regular update cadences.

opportunities.title: Enhance Continuity Beyond Key Personnel
opportunities.description: The reliance on Jane's personal network and expertise is noted as a potential risk for continuity, suggesting a need to distribute knowledge within the broader team.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Reliance on Jane's personal network noted as a potential continuity consideration.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure key contacts and shared knowledge are distributed within the broader team to maintain continuity.

opportunities.title: Potential Future Governance and Structural Support
opportunities.description: Kristin mentioned that current discussions focus on governance and structural change, indicating potential future needs in these areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: At present, the board is stable with no immediate hiring needs. Discussions focus on governance, structural change, and ongoing portfolio matters.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively offer expertise and support in governance and structural change to anticipate future needs.

opportunities.title: Leverage Technology and AI Expertise
opportunities.description: Technology and AI are active topics at the management level, suggesting an opportunity to expand services in these areas.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Technology and AI are more active topics at management level than at board level.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should explore opportunities to provide technology and AI-related consulting services to Delivery Hero's management team.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Relationship with Norwegian Market Expert
opportunities.description: Kristin expressed trust in Stieg, a consultant familiar with the Norwegian market, indicating an opportunity to re-engage and strengthen this relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: She has a colleague called Stieg, I [have] used him quite a few times, and I know him well and trust him...I see him as a Norwegian market type of person.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should ensure Stieg remains actively engaged with Delivery Hero to maintain and strengthen this trusted relationship.

opportunities.title: Need for Market Insights and Data
opportunities.description: Fiona values the additional insights and data provided by Korn Ferry, which are used as development tools for candidates.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We get a great richness of data from that...not necessarily to determine whether or not the person will be offered the role, but quite often [we use it as] a development tool for when they land.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to provide and expand on market insights and data to support candidate development and client decision-making.

opportunities.title: Deepen Consultant Involvement in HR Searches
opportunities.description: Fiona noted stronger delivery when long-standing consultants familiar with NatWest were involved in HR searches.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We felt that Hilary and Samira got what we were looking for...we gained a better service when [they] were involved.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that consultants with established relationships and understanding of NatWest are involved in HR searches to maintain delivery quality.

opportunities.title: Address Communication Lapses
opportunities.description: Although communication is generally strong, a single lapse was noted, which was quickly resolved.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've just had one occasion where I was blindsided. But Hilary picked up the phone straight away and was so hugely apologetic.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review communication protocols to prevent future lapses and reinforce the importance of maintaining consistent updates.

opportunities.title: Enhance Continuity Across Teams
opportunities.description: Fiona highlighted the importance of continuity and consistency across engagements, particularly with consultants who have established relationships.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The value of maintaining involvement of consultants with established relationships to preserve cultural understanding and delivery consistency.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a strategy to ensure continuity by involving consultants with established client relationships in key projects.

opportunities.title: Future Talent Challenges in Specialized Areas
opportunities.description: Daryl mentioned the need for sourcing specialists in medical, actuarial, and finance functions due to tight market supply.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: Future talent challenges include sourcing specialists in areas such as medical, actuarial, and finance functions, where market supply remains tight.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should prepare targeted strategies for sourcing talent in these specialized areas to address future needs.

opportunities.title: Consideration for Future Searches
opportunities.description: Daryl confirmed that Korn Ferry would be considered for future searches, depending on level and scope.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: Daryl confirmed that Korn Ferry would 'definitely be in consideration' for future searches, depending on level and scope.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain regular contact with Daryl to stay informed about upcoming search opportunities and ensure readiness to engage.

opportunities.title: Maintain Search Momentum in Final Stages
opportunities.description: Daryl noted a slowdown in recruitment activity once final candidates were identified, suggesting a need for continued engagement.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: It feels like it slows down considerably once two or three candidates are kind of at the top of the list.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should implement a strategy to maintain recruitment momentum until an offer is finalized, ensuring continuous candidate engagement.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Communication Protocols
opportunities.description: There were issues with candidate communication timing, where a candidate learned of an outcome from Korn Ferry before internal communication occurred.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: The employee's first understanding that they didn't get the job came from Korn Ferry as opposed to the leader.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should clarify communication roles and ensure proper timing of candidate updates to prevent premature information sharing.

opportunities.title: Proactive Communication During Quieter Phases
opportunities.description: Daryl suggested maintaining regular meetings even when candidate activity is lower to ensure continuous engagement.
opportunities.company: Blue Cross Blue Shield of Nebraska
opportunities.supportingQuote: Maybe being more proactive in setting up weekly or biweekly meetings even when they didn't have candidates or any additional [information].
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should schedule regular check-ins during quieter phases of the search process to maintain engagement and transparency.

opportunities.title: Increase Awareness of Non-Search Offerings
opportunities.description: Lew has limited awareness of Korn Ferry's consulting and strategy services, indicating a potential area for future engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Broader awareness of Korn Ferry's non-search offerings (consulting, strategy) remains low.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should provide Lew with information and case studies about their consulting and strategy services to explore potential future needs.

opportunities.title: Explore Partnership-Based Pricing
opportunities.description: Lew suggested that the pricing structure could better reflect the long-term loyalty and frequency of engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think I deserve a lower fee.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider offering Lew a preferred rate or loyalty pricing structure to deepen the partnership.

opportunities.title: Enhance Post-Placement Follow-Up Visibility
opportunities.description: Lew is not always aware of formal post-placement follow-up, which could strengthen the partnership if made more visible.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm not aware of them following back up with candidates.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Improve communication about post-placement follow-up activities to demonstrate continuity and support long-term retention.

opportunities.title: Invite to Korn Ferry Events
opportunities.description: Lew mentioned he is still waiting for an invite to go Pro AM on the Korn Ferry tour, indicating a desire for more engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Lew mentioned he was still waiting for an invite to go Pro AM on the Korn Ferry tour.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Extend an invitation to Lew for upcoming Korn Ferry events to reinforce goodwill and client loyalty.

opportunities.title: Need for Higher-Level Analytical Roles
opportunities.description: Jen mentioned the increasing use of AI and automation in her team, which is driving a need for higher-level people to analyze data and ensure correct conclusions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We're using some more intelligent solutions to cover some of the base work...driving [a need for] higher level people to be able to analyse...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer expertise in sourcing and developing high-level analytical talent to support Generac's evolving needs.

opportunities.title: Leverage Broader People-Centric Expertise
opportunities.description: Jen values Korn Ferry's broader strength in people-related engagements, having engaged them for culture and organizational projects beyond executive search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We used them last year for our spans and layers exercise, our culture assessment...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively offer additional organizational and people-focused services to deepen the relationship with Generac.

opportunities.title: Proactive Follow-Up on Paused Roles
opportunities.description: Jen highlighted the need for proactive communication and follow-up when roles remain open or paused.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Opportunity to strengthen continuity through proactive communication and follow-up when roles remain open or paused.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain regular communication with Generac to share potential candidates for paused or future roles.

opportunities.title: Standardize Client Experience Across Teams
opportunities.description: There was a noted variation in experience and delivery style between teams, indicating a need for a unified client experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Differences in approach between functional teams highlight an opportunity to ensure a unified client experience.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should implement best practice sharing across teams to ensure consistency in client experience.

opportunities.title: Early Expectation Setting on Compensation
opportunities.description: The ESG search faced challenges due to misalignment between compensation expectations and market realities.
opportunities.supportingQuote: A mismatch upfront with expectation versus compensation level, and where we thought the market was...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should prioritize early discussions on compensation and role expectations to align with market conditions.

opportunities.title: Support for Cultural Integration
opportunities.description: Ferrero faces a cultural integration challenge due to recent acquisitions, and the engagement survey is crucial for understanding and unifying employee sentiment across different legacies.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We've doubled the number of employees within the last 10 years. 50% of our employees didn't start their journey in Ferrero, they were acquired by Ferrero.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer tailored solutions to help Ferrero integrate diverse employee backgrounds and foster a unified company culture.

opportunities.title: Deepen Engagement in Employee Lifecycle
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry is already partnering with Ferrero on the next phase of employee lifecycle measurement, indicating an opportunity to expand involvement in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry continues to partner with Ferrero on the next phase of employee lifecycle measurement, reflecting a strong and ongoing relationship.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should propose additional services or tools that can enhance the employee lifecycle measurement process.

opportunities.title: Address Communication Style Concerns
opportunities.description: A project manager's risk-focused communication style caused unnecessary concern, suggesting a need to re-engage with a more balanced approach.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Her style in engaging with us as a team was one that would focus on the risks and the negatives... it kind of struck fear about how this was all going to go wrong.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should provide training or guidelines to ensure project managers maintain a positive, solution-oriented communication style.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication Tone Consistency
opportunities.description: Differences in communication style affected feedback reception, highlighting the need for a more consistent, reassuring tone.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Variation in communication tone. Differences in delivery style affected how feedback was received; a more positive, reassuring tone was better received by the team.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should standardize communication protocols to ensure a consistent and positive tone across all interactions.

opportunities.title: Enhance Support During Compensation Discussions
opportunities.description: Gerd expected more assertive support from Korn Ferry during compensation discussions to challenge candidate expectations more robustly.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would have expected a little bit more of support... I would have appreciated a little bit more of challenging behaviour versus the candidate.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clearer guidance and challenge candidate expectations when appropriate during compensation discussions.

opportunities.title: Improve Initial Briefing Clarity
opportunities.description: One stakeholder felt that the initial briefing did not fully convey the nuances of the brief, although this was later resolved.
opportunities.supportingQuote: My experience of the actual briefing call was not a good one... I felt they didn't fully grasp what we wanted.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure full alignment on nuanced or non-standard briefs from the outset to avoid early uncertainty.

opportunities.title: Follow-Up on Candidate Onboarding
opportunities.description: There was uncertainty about whether Korn Ferry followed up with the hire after onboarding.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I don't know. I have no idea if they did follow up... there was no need for them to support us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Clarify and communicate the process for candidate onboarding follow-up to ensure client awareness and satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Leverage High Satisfaction for Future Engagements
opportunities.description: Both stakeholders expressed high satisfaction and intent to reuse Korn Ferry, indicating potential for future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Both interviewees stated they would work with Korn Ferry again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively reach out to discuss upcoming needs and explore opportunities for continued collaboration.

opportunities.title: Potential for Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Michael indicated that Korn Ferry would be the first contact for any future executive searches at the University of Pennsylvania.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Michael noted that they would be the first people contacted for any future searches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular check-ins with Michael to stay informed about upcoming search needs and ensure readiness to engage.

opportunities.title: Deepen Consultant Familiarity with University
opportunities.description: Michael appreciated the continuity of team members familiar with the University, which strengthened communication and efficiency.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We were really impressed by Sophie...[we asked if] there [was] any way we could think about having her join the team [of the most recent search] because she knows the institution, she knows us.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that consultants who have previously worked with the University of Pennsylvania are retained for future projects to maintain institutional knowledge.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate-Day Logistics Coordination
opportunities.description: Michael identified the need for clearer coordination and ownership of candidate-day logistics to avoid duplication and streamline planning.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I just think it could have been a little bit more seamless...there's probably an opportunity in the search process to just sync with them a little bit better.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish clear roles and responsibilities early in the search process to improve coordination and execution of candidate-day logistics.

opportunities.title: Reassess KF4D Assessment Value
opportunities.description: The KF4D assessment tool was described as underwhelming and not adding significant value to the search process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I wasn't blown away, [and] I don't think our president was blown away by it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Reevaluate the use and delivery of the KF4D assessment to ensure it provides clear, demonstrable value aligned with client needs.

opportunities.title: Need for Improved Client Recovery Processes
opportunities.description: Leslie expressed a need for better client recovery processes, emphasizing the importance of empathy and proactive reassurance during service challenges.
opportunities.supportingQuote: None of that should be coming out of your mouth, what you should be saying is 'We're so embarrassed. We're so sorry. This will never happen again. We've already fixed the problem, what else can we do to make this better for you?'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and implement a training program for consultants focused on empathetic communication and effective client recovery strategies.

opportunities.title: Engage Senior Leadership for Relationship Recovery
opportunities.description: Leslie is open to discussing feedback with senior leadership to improve future delivery and rebuild confidence in the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They valued Korn Ferry’s openness to feedback and said they would be comfortable discussing these points further with senior leadership to help improve future delivery.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Facilitate a meeting between Leslie and Korn Ferry's senior leadership to discuss feedback and demonstrate commitment to addressing concerns.

opportunities.title: Address Erosion of Trust and Confidence
opportunities.description: Cumulative process errors and limited recovery have led to a questioning of overall quality assurance, indicating a need to re-engage and strengthen trust.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Then it makes you start to question everything else. Are they going to get the contract right? Did they actually ask the clients these questions?
opportunities.suggestedAction: Conduct a thorough review of internal processes and communicate the improvements to Leslie to restore trust and confidence.

opportunities.title: Enhance Scheduling and Coordination Systems
opportunities.description: Leslie identified several coordination lapses, such as scheduling errors and communication breakdowns, that affected confidence.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Communication breakdowns and scheduling errors. Several coordination lapses affected confidence.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review and upgrade scheduling and communication systems to ensure consistency and prevent client-facing errors.

opportunities.title: Elevate Quality Standards and Consultant Input
opportunities.description: Leslie was underwhelmed by early deliverables and expected more human expertise rather than reliance on AI.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I will say [I was a] little disappointed [with] what they put together as the package compared to what I had seen in the past.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Revisit consultant training to emphasize the importance of expert input and refinement in deliverables, ensuring high-quality standards are consistently met.

opportunities.title: Potential Future CEO Searches
opportunities.description: Michael confirmed he would immediately re-engage Jena for any future CEO search, indicating a need for similar services in the future.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Michael confirmed this is the only service they currently use Korn Ferry for and confirmed he would immediately re-engage Jena for any future CEO search.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Maintain regular contact with Michael to ensure Korn Ferry is top-of-mind for any future executive search needs.

opportunities.title: Expand Services Beyond CEO Searches
opportunities.description: Currently, Korn Ferry is only engaged for CEO searches, presenting an opportunity to offer additional services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Michael confirmed this is the only service they currently use Korn Ferry for.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore opportunities to introduce other Korn Ferry services such as leadership development or board advisory to OneBlood.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Relationship with Jena's Leadership
opportunities.description: Jena's leadership and expertise are central to the strong relationship with OneBlood, suggesting a need to maintain and strengthen this connection.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Jena was viewed as central to the relationship: 'She was the linchpin… when something works for you, you stick with it.'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure Jena remains the primary contact for OneBlood and continues to lead engagements to reinforce trust and satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Proactive Offer of Broader Expertise
opportunities.description: Matthias appreciated the transparency and effectiveness of the current engagement, suggesting that Korn Ferry could proactively offer additional services aligned with Format's ongoing people and organisational priorities.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Extend awareness of broader expertise: where appropriate, proactively link Korn Ferry's relevant wider capabilities to Format's ongoing people and organisational priorities to drive future opportunities.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should identify and present additional services that align with Format's strategic goals to foster future collaboration.

opportunities.title: Leverage Strong Reputation for Further Engagements
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's strong market reputation and Sasha's personal credibility were key factors in the successful engagement, indicating potential for further collaboration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry's strong market reputation and Sasha's personal credibility underpinned the engagement.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should leverage its strong reputation and Sasha's credibility to explore additional opportunities with Format.

opportunities.title: Maintain High Responsiveness and Accessibility
opportunities.description: Matthias valued the quick responses and availability during the final stages of the search, suggesting that maintaining this level of service is crucial for future engagements.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The interaction was fast whenever [there was] news or, when we were in the final phase, fighting for the candidate, [they] returned calls immediately [and were] accessible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should ensure continued high levels of responsiveness and accessibility in future projects with Format.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication on Candidate Strengths and Risks
opportunities.description: While communication was generally praised, continuing to provide candid feedback on candidate strengths and risks will further improve the service.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Maintain transparent communication: continue the open dialogue that Matthias valued, including frank discussion of candidate strengths and risks.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain and enhance its transparent communication strategy, ensuring candid discussions about candidate strengths and risks.

opportunities.title: Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Philippe expressed a clear intention to work with Korn Ferry again for future executive searches without considering alternatives.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Definitely no brainer... I wouldn't even benchmark.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively reach out to Philippe to discuss upcoming hiring needs and offer tailored solutions.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Avanos
opportunities.description: Philippe's strong trust in Olivier and Korn Ferry suggests potential to expand services beyond executive search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He managed to prove that... he took that also to Korn Ferry and even polished it more.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional HR services or consulting opportunities that could benefit Avanos.

opportunities.title: Reinforce Successful Practices
opportunities.description: Philippe valued the early involvement of researchers and transparent communication, indicating these practices should be reinforced.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He involved his researchers straight away... otherwise you always lose some essence about it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure these practices are consistently applied in all future engagements with Avanos.

opportunities.title: Interest in Curated Peer Networking
opportunities.description: Keith expressed a desire for Korn Ferry to facilitate smaller, curated peer networking groups, as current industry forums are seen as exhausting and lacking value.
opportunities.supportingQuote: If networking became part of that... that would be helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer curated, small-group peer networking opportunities tailored to Keith's industry and interests.

opportunities.title: Expand Engagement Beyond Search Services
opportunities.description: Keith does not currently engage with Korn Ferry's broader services due to limited headspace, but this is not due to dissatisfaction.
opportunities.supportingQuote: When I need something, I go looking... I don't often pick my head up and look around.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively introduce and demonstrate the value of Korn Ferry's non-search services to Keith in a concise and engaging manner.

opportunities.title: Maintain Human-Led Search Approach
opportunities.description: Keith values the human element in search processes and is concerned about the use of AI diminishing this aspect.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would hate it if... there's weird AI searches.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that any AI tools introduced in the search process enhance rather than replace the human judgement and personal involvement that Keith values.

opportunities.title: Leverage Assessment Tools in Onboarding
opportunities.description: Keith finds the KF assessment tool helpful for onboarding and managing new hires, indicating an opportunity to further leverage these insights.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Yes, I use that tool. I find it very helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide more explicit guidance on how to use assessment insights for team integration and early performance management.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Candidate Materials
opportunities.description: Paul highlighted the need for earlier distribution of candidate packs to improve meeting efficiency and preparation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It would be really good to get that the night before... it would speed up the meeting.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure candidate materials are provided with enough lead time for client review, ideally the night before meetings.

opportunities.title: Awareness of Assessment Offerings
opportunities.description: Paul was unaware of Korn Ferry's assessment capabilities, indicating a need for better communication of these services.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I didn't know they had an assessment.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Increase client awareness of assessment tools and how they can support senior hiring processes.

opportunities.title: Promotion of Non-Search Offerings
opportunities.description: Paul expressed a desire for more proactive promotion of Korn Ferry's non-search services, such as organization consulting.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They wouldn't register in my head because they've never pushed it... Their practices need a bit more joined up thinking.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively explain and promote non-search services to clients, particularly Chairs and Boards.

opportunities.title: Enhance Internal Coordination Across Practices
opportunities.description: Paul suggested a need for a more unified approach across Korn Ferry's practices to avoid being perceived as siloed.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Their practices need a bit more joined up thinking.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Present a more unified cross-practice approach to clients to enhance the perception of a cohesive service offering.

opportunities.title: Guidance on AI in Recruitment
opportunities.description: Joanne expressed a need for guidance on the implications of AI tools in recruitment processes, particularly regarding candidate impacts.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Joanne noted the need for guidance on pitfalls and candidate impacts related to AI tools in application processes.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide Joanne with insights and best practices on integrating AI in recruitment, focusing on transparency and fairness.

opportunities.title: Increase Awareness of Korn Ferry Services
opportunities.description: Joanne is interested in understanding the full range of Korn Ferry's offerings to better field internal referrals.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Better understanding the breadth of what they offer... would be helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Organize a briefing session or provide materials that outline the full spectrum of Korn Ferry's services.

opportunities.title: Facilitate Peer-to-Peer Networking
opportunities.description: Joanne welcomes opportunities for peer-to-peer networking and knowledge exchange beyond direct guidance from Korn Ferry.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would welcome that... peer-to-peer networking would always be [helpful].
opportunities.suggestedAction: Create a platform or event for leaders in governance and nominations to share insights and experiences.

opportunities.title: Enhance Candidate Coordination Practices
opportunities.description: There was a minor issue with candidate scheduling due to time zone challenges, which was the only escalation Joanne experienced.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They had a candidate who couldn't seem to connect... it was like phone tag and email tag.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Review and optimize communication practices to ensure seamless candidate coordination across time zones.

opportunities.title: Structured Knowledge Sharing
opportunities.description: Joanne expressed interest in newsletters and cross-sector learning, indicating a desire for more structured knowledge-sharing.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Interest in newsletters, peer networks, and cross-sector learning indicates appetite for more structured knowledge-sharing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a regular newsletter or knowledge-sharing platform that provides curated insights and trends relevant to PMI's context.

opportunities.title: Need for Modern Training Formats
opportunities.description: Felix expressed a desire for more modern and interactive training tools, such as e-learning or multimedia resources.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I would wish to have something like more interactive... a nice movie and e-learning would also be helpful... could be a bit more modern.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop and offer modern training formats, including e-learning and interactive modules, to enhance user engagement.

opportunities.title: Enhance Market Data Configurability
opportunities.description: Felix noted the need for more specific filters in market data, particularly to differentiate between bonus-paying and non-bonus-paying companies.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I miss... very specific aspects... I cannot say I don't want to see only companies who pay a bonus... sometimes I'm not happy with this kind of data submission.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Introduce clearer filters in market data to allow differentiation between bonus-paying and non-bonus-paying companies.

opportunities.title: Offer Practical and Affordable Grading Tool
opportunities.description: Felix had to create their own grading tool due to dissatisfaction with existing options, indicating a gap in practical and cost-effective tools.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I've also created a grading tool by ourselves, because they don't provide one which is very useful or not too expensive.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore the development of a practical, affordable grading tool to meet client needs.

opportunities.title: Address Functional vs Hierarchical Leadership Complexities
opportunities.description: Felix found it difficult to benchmark roles with functional versus hierarchical leadership within the current methodology.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Many people have functional leadership roles in comparison with hierarchical... can be difficult.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide guidance and examples on handling functional versus hierarchical leadership roles within the methodology.

opportunities.title: Onboarding Support for New CEO
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry has promised to support the onboarding of the new CEO, but this phase has not yet begun.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They have promised us that they will be there... but it hasn't really begun yet.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Initiate the onboarding support process promptly to ensure a smooth transition for the new CEO.

opportunities.title: Single Point of Contact for Communication
opportunities.description: Early confusion was caused by communications from multiple Korn Ferry staff, making it difficult to track information.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Early on, it was a little confusing... several different people... reaching out... we couldn't search for [emails] easily.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Establish a single, consistent communication point from the start of the project to streamline information flow and reduce confusion.

opportunities.title: Leverage Institutional Knowledge for Future Projects
opportunities.description: Korn Ferry's familiarity with the museum has strengthened the partnership, suggesting potential for deeper collaboration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They had helped us with salary surveys... market analyses... job description... we'd been working with them on and off for two or three years.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore additional areas where Korn Ferry's institutional knowledge can be leveraged to support the museum's strategic goals.

opportunities.title: Enhanced Gender-Diverse Sourcing
opportunities.description: Jeanette expressed a need for more gender-diverse candidate slates in future searches, as repeated reminders were necessary to ensure female candidates were considered.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We had to remind the guys a number of times that we want to see women as well as men.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a transparent and proactive process to ensure gender-diverse candidate slates are presented from the outset.

opportunities.title: Improve Compensation Discovery Process
opportunities.description: The process of obtaining compensation information was slow and lacked detail, contributing to delays and the loss of a preferred candidate.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Trying to get out of them what current comp was, was impossible.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Gather full, detailed compensation information early in the process to prevent delays and ensure clarity during negotiations.

opportunities.title: Rebuild Trust with Assertive Leadership
opportunities.description: Jeanette felt the consultants lacked assertiveness and leadership, which led to frustration and doubts about using Korn Ferry again.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'm not sure we'll go back there again, because that was really hard work at the end.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Proactively lead discussions with clear recommendations and confident facilitation to rebuild trust and demonstrate value.

opportunities.title: Timely Delivery of Reports and Materials
opportunities.description: Reports were often delivered too late for adequate review, impacting preparation and decision-making.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The reports would often land an hour or two before the call... you have no hope in hell of getting to it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure reports and candidate materials are shared with sufficient lead time for stakeholders to review and prepare.

opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship with Proactive Brief Refinement
opportunities.description: Misalignment in the candidate brief persisted without proactive correction, suggesting an opportunity to deepen the relationship through better understanding and alignment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They just weren't hitting the right brief.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Regularly review and refine the candidate brief with the client to ensure alignment and demonstrate commitment to their needs.

opportunities.title: Need for Succession Planning Support
opportunities.description: Greg Aarssen expressed a need for more rigorous succession planning and third-party evaluations to identify blind spots in their current processes.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we need to have someone that is doing some of these... evaluations and analysis to make sure that we don't have blind spots.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer tailored succession planning services to address these needs and help TriSummit Utilities improve their processes.

opportunities.title: Interest in Broader Board-Level Services
opportunities.description: Greg is exploring the potential for Korn Ferry to provide additional board-level support, indicating an opportunity to expand the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Greg sees clear scope for more rigorous succession assessment and board-level support, and is already exploring this with Korn Ferry.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively propose board-level services and support to deepen their engagement with TriSummit Utilities.

opportunities.title: Re-engage for Future Executive Searches
opportunities.description: Greg expressed a strong intent to reuse Korn Ferry for future executive searches, highlighting the importance of maintaining the relationship.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Would I ever use these people again? I can't imagine not using them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should maintain regular contact with Greg to ensure they are the first choice for any upcoming executive search needs.

opportunities.title: Enhance Visibility in the Market
opportunities.description: Greg suggested that Korn Ferry could strengthen its visibility, which could enhance their market presence and client acquisition.
opportunities.supportingQuote: He struggled to identify any issues with the work itself, suggesting only that Korn Ferry could potentially strengthen its visibility.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should invest in marketing and branding efforts to increase their visibility and recognition in the industry.

opportunities.title: Need for concise assessment reports
opportunities.description: The CEO expressed a desire for more concise, clearly framed summaries in assessment reports, particularly on concrete behaviors such as handling conflict and driving restructuring.
opportunities.supportingQuote: You might sometimes maybe have wished them to be a little bit more black and white... on the very concrete things, how things will work.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Develop a format for executive summaries that highlights key behavioral insights in a concise manner.

opportunities.title: Enhance practical client experience
opportunities.description: The CEO mentioned a minor irritation with the lack of parking spaces at Korn Ferry's office, which affected the convenience of visits.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I'd wish they had parking spaces in their own office, because you always have to go to another building... it's a bit annoying.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore options to improve parking arrangements or provide clear guidance on convenient parking for client visits.

opportunities.title: Leverage strong individual relationships
opportunities.description: The CEO's decision to work with Korn Ferry was heavily influenced by trust in specific individuals and existing relationships.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I knew the boss, I knew the consultant that I wanted to work with, because I have a deep trust in [Danny]'s... human touch.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue to nurture and leverage strong personal relationships with key decision-makers to expand engagement opportunities.

opportunities.title: Maintain speed and transparency in processes
opportunities.description: The CEO appreciated the fast candidate generation and efficient interview process, which contributed to a positive experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Everything went very fast, the finding of the candidates in both role. I also was impressed that it was fast...
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure that future engagements maintain the same level of speed and transparency to strengthen client satisfaction and loyalty.

opportunities.title: Reintroduce Dual-Consultant Model
opportunities.description: The dual-consultant model was a unique differentiator that added value through diverse perspectives. Its removal has diminished the perceived quality of consultation.
opportunities.supportingQuote: That was the differentiating factor... two different individuals from two different cultures.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Explore the feasibility of reintroducing the dual-consultant model selectively in high-value markets or key accounts.

opportunities.title: Clarify Value of Assessment Tools
opportunities.description: Assessment tools were provided but not used, as they did not support Jan's decision-making for hires.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got that for free in some instances, but honestly, I didn't use it.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Provide clearer guidance on when and how assessment tools can meaningfully inform hiring decisions.

opportunities.title: Strengthen Consultation Quality
opportunities.description: The removal of the second consultant led to a perceived reduction in consultation quality and richness of perspective.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We got different quality of the consultations because obviously the second person was adding a certain perspective and value.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Consider ways to enhance consultation quality, possibly through periodic inclusion of additional consultants for diverse perspectives.

opportunities.title: Separate Positioning for Broader Consulting Services
opportunities.description: Jan does not assume Korn Ferry's search capabilities translate to transformation or development work, indicating a need for distinct positioning.
opportunities.supportingQuote: No, because that's a different skill set... I would again pitch and see who's best.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure broader consulting services are introduced by the right experts, highlighting distinct capabilities.

opportunities.title: Broader Candidate Sourcing for High-Profile Roles
opportunities.description: Gary expressed a need for Korn Ferry to explore a wider range of candidate backgrounds, especially for high-profile roles, to include candidates from adjacent sectors.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I had urged them to look broad... like college presidents... and they didn't really do that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should enhance their candidate sourcing strategy to include diverse and non-traditional backgrounds for high-profile roles.

opportunities.title: Early Validation of Candidate Readiness
opportunities.description: There is a need for Korn Ferry to confirm practical considerations such as relocation readiness earlier in the process to prevent late-stage withdrawals.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Korn Ferry should have vetted this ahead of time... before we went through this final testing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Implement a more rigorous early-stage validation process for candidate readiness, focusing on practical considerations like relocation.

opportunities.title: Maintain Continuity and Ownership
opportunities.description: Gary noted a drop in engagement and ownership when the lead partner was temporarily absent, suggesting a need for consistent leadership throughout the engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: It just felt a little bit... an ownership thing.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Ensure clear ownership and consistent client touchpoints are maintained throughout the engagement, even during team changes.

opportunities.title: Explore Transferable Leadership Capabilities
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to expand the relationship by considering candidates with transferable leadership capabilities from different sectors.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Where appropriate, continue to explore a wide range of potential backgrounds and experiences.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should actively seek candidates with transferable skills and leadership capabilities from diverse sectors for future searches.

opportunities.title: Need for Enhanced Partnership Engagement
opportunities.description: Julie expressed a need for a more partnership-led approach, particularly in recognizing the primary contact's role and ensuring collaborative engagement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They're managing up... in a way that felt somewhat disrespectful to me and my role.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Encourage consistent recognition of the primary client contact's role and foster a collaborative working environment.
