opportunities.title: Deepen Relationship Through Collaborative Fee Discussions
opportunities.description: There is an opportunity to expand the relationship by adopting a more flexible and partnership-oriented approach to fee discussions.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Being treated like that makes me not want to work with them again.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Apply discretion in fee-related discussions to align with expectations of a long-term relationship.

opportunities.title: Re-engage by Addressing Operational Burdens
opportunities.description: Julie highlighted the operational burden placed on the client team, indicating a need to re-engage by clarifying and balancing logistical responsibilities.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They rely on us very heavily for everything logistical...It feels like they kind of expect us to do their logistics.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Align expectations around logistics, coordination, and reporting to ensure internal teams are not carrying disproportionate effort.

opportunities.title: Improve Process Efficiency and Continuity
opportunities.description: There is a need to improve process efficiency by ensuring materials, templates, and agreed formats are retained and reused to minimize duplication.
opportunities.supportingQuote: They were like, 'Oh, we don't have that template. Can you send it again?'
opportunities.suggestedAction: Strengthen continuity in process management to minimize duplication and improve efficiency.

opportunities.title: Need for Broader Consulting Support
opportunities.description: Tim indicated that broader consulting support might be needed in the future as the organization scales.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think we'd need a bit more scale before we went to somebody of Korn Ferry size to do other work like that.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Monitor Logistics UK's growth and proactively offer consulting services as they scale.

opportunities.title: Leverage Psychometric Tools for Development
opportunities.description: Tim plans to use Korn Ferry's psychometric tools for development planning, indicating an opportunity to expand services in this area.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We use their psychometric tools for assessment, and they were very, very good. It will be used for a development plan, yeah, absolutely.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Offer tailored development programs using psychometric assessments to enhance leadership capabilities.

opportunities.title: Focus on Outward-Facing Leadership
opportunities.description: There is a growing priority for high-quality outward-facing leadership following the CEO appointment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The most important thing for us is that our outward facing activities are done by really high-quality people.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Engage with Logistics UK to identify and develop outward-facing leadership capabilities.

opportunities.title: Maintain Strong Communication and Accessibility
opportunities.description: Tim appreciated the structured communication and accessibility throughout the process.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We had one scheduled weekly call throughout the process... and they were always available for other queries, more ad hoc stuff.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Continue the practice of regular check-ins and high accessibility to maintain client satisfaction.

opportunities.title: Need for Advanced Leadership Training
opportunities.description: Claire mentioned the potential need for more advanced leadership training programs as ASML continues to grow and face new challenges.
opportunities.supportingQuote: As we expand, we might need more advanced leadership training to tackle new challenges.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should propose a tailored advanced leadership training program to address ASML's future growth challenges.

opportunities.title: Broaden Consulting Services to Other Departments
opportunities.description: Claire expressed interest in exploring consulting services for departments beyond the current scope.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are considering consulting services for other departments as well.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should schedule a meeting to discuss potential consulting opportunities in other departments at ASML.

opportunities.title: Regular Check-ins to Strengthen Partnership
opportunities.description: Claire suggested that regular check-ins could help maintain and strengthen the partnership.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Regular check-ins would help us stay aligned and strengthen our partnership.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should establish a schedule for regular check-ins with ASML to ensure alignment and address any emerging needs.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication on Project Progress
opportunities.description: Claire noted that more frequent updates on project progress would improve the service experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: More frequent updates on project progress would be beneficial.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should implement a more frequent and structured communication plan for project updates with ASML.

opportunities.title: Interest in Leadership Development Programs
opportunities.description: The client expressed a potential need for leadership development programs to support their growing team.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are considering leadership development programs as our team expands.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer a consultation to discuss tailored leadership development solutions.

opportunities.title: Desire for Broader Talent Solutions
opportunities.description: The client is open to exploring additional talent management services beyond executive search.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are interested in exploring broader talent solutions to enhance our HR capabilities.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should schedule a meeting to present their full suite of talent management services.

opportunities.title: Follow-up on Previous Project Success
opportunities.description: The client mentioned a successful past project and implied a desire for continued collaboration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The last project was a success, and we are keen to see what more we can achieve together.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should reach out to discuss potential new projects and reinforce the partnership.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication During Projects
opportunities.description: The client suggested that more frequent updates during projects would improve the service experience.
opportunities.supportingQuote: More frequent updates during projects would be appreciated.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should implement a more structured communication plan with regular updates for ongoing projects.

opportunities.title: Need for Leadership Development Programs
opportunities.description: Luke mentioned that Kone is looking to enhance their leadership capabilities in the coming years.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are planning to focus more on leadership development in the near future.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should propose tailored leadership development programs to Kone.

opportunities.title: Interest in Expanding Executive Search Services
opportunities.description: Luke expressed interest in exploring more comprehensive executive search services beyond the current scope.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are considering expanding our executive search efforts to include more regions.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer a proposal for expanding executive search services to additional regions.

opportunities.title: Desire for More Frequent Check-ins
opportunities.description: Luke indicated that more regular communication would be beneficial to maintain alignment.
opportunities.supportingQuote: I think more frequent check-ins would help us stay on the same page.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should schedule regular check-in meetings with Kone to ensure ongoing alignment.

opportunities.title: Enhance Reporting and Feedback Mechanisms
opportunities.description: Luke noted that the current reporting and feedback mechanisms could be more detailed and timely.
opportunities.supportingQuote: The reports could be more detailed and timely to help us make better decisions.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should improve the detail and timeliness of their reporting and feedback mechanisms.

opportunities.title: Need for Advanced Data Analytics
opportunities.description: The client expressed interest in leveraging advanced data analytics to improve hospital operations and patient care.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We are looking into how advanced data analytics can help us streamline operations and enhance patient outcomes.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should propose a tailored data analytics solution to meet the hospital's specific needs.

opportunities.title: Expand Leadership Development Programs
opportunities.description: The client is interested in expanding their leadership development initiatives to include more staff members.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We want to extend our leadership programs to a wider range of staff to build a stronger leadership pipeline.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should offer a comprehensive leadership development program that can be scaled across different departments.

opportunities.title: Regular Check-ins for Continuous Improvement
opportunities.description: The client appreciates regular interactions and feedback sessions to ensure ongoing alignment and improvement.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Regular check-ins have been beneficial, and we would like to continue this practice to stay aligned.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should schedule regular quarterly meetings to discuss progress and gather feedback.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication Channels
opportunities.description: The client mentioned the need for more streamlined communication channels to facilitate better collaboration.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Improving our communication channels could help us collaborate more effectively.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should assess current communication practices and suggest improvements for more efficient collaboration.

opportunities.title: Anticipate Future Talent Needs
opportunities.description: Karina expressed interest in anticipating future talent needs as ExxonMobil continues to grow and diversify.
opportunities.supportingQuote: As we grow, we'll need to anticipate our talent needs better.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should proactively offer strategic workforce planning sessions to help ExxonMobil forecast and prepare for future talent requirements.

opportunities.title: Broaden Service Offerings
opportunities.description: Karina is open to exploring additional services beyond professional search, such as leadership development and training.
opportunities.supportingQuote: We might be interested in leadership development services in the future.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should present a portfolio of leadership development and training services to ExxonMobil to explore potential interest.

opportunities.title: Regular Check-ins to Strengthen Partnership
opportunities.description: Karina appreciates the current relationship but suggests regular check-ins to ensure alignment and address any emerging needs.
opportunities.supportingQuote: Regular check-ins would help us stay aligned and address any needs promptly.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should schedule quarterly meetings with Karina to discuss ongoing projects and any new requirements.

opportunities.title: Enhance Communication During Projects
opportunities.description: Karina mentioned that while the service is excellent, more frequent updates during projects would be beneficial.
opportunities.supportingQuote: More frequent updates during projects would be helpful.
opportunities.suggestedAction: Korn Ferry should implement a more structured communication plan with regular updates for ongoing projects.
